timeline.message: ISPN-11948 server/tests HotRod clients should utilise the ProtoStreamMarshaller

timeline.bodyText: @tristantarrant I couldn't think of a better way of accomplishing this whilst keeping infinispan-jboss-marshalling on the classpath and making it so by default the tests utilise ProtoStream. In 12 we should probably remove the automatic configuration of GenericJbossMarshaller when infinispan-jboss-marshalling is present on the classpath.
timeline.author: ryanemerson
